net.sf.mmm.util.lang.api.concern

Interface Security

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CsrfToken, CsrfTokenManager, ExceptionUtil
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCsrfTokenManager, CsrfTokenManagerDefaultImpl, DefaultCsrfToken, ExceptionUtilImpl, Password, SecurityErrorUserException

    public interface Security
    This interface is used to document the concern security and track special support that we offer for this purpose. In order not to reinvent the wheel, we do NOT create yet another security framework. Instead we suggest to use spring-security and support integration with it. However, there are some missing links that we aim to close with our project. Have a look at the known subinterfaces and implementing classes to get an overview.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
